mapper.select: select user_id, password, emp_pic from emp where user_id=#{user_id}
select d.deptno, d.dname from emp e join dept d on e.deptno = d.deptno where e.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update emp set password=#{password}, emp_pic=#{emp_pic} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) as totalnum from (select sb.sched_num, sb.project_num, sb.sched_prog from schedule_board sb join schedule s on sb.sched_num = s.sched_num where s.user_id=#{user_id})

select count(*) as donenum from (select sb.sched_num, sb.project_num, sb.sched_prog from schedule_board sb join schedule s on sb.sched_num = s.sched_num where s.user_id=#{user_id} and sb.sched_prog=3)
select p.project_num, p.project_name from emp e join project p on e.deptno = p.deptno where e.user_id=#{user_id}
select count(*) as totalBoardNum from emp e join project p on e.deptno = p.deptno join schedule_board sb on p.project_num=sb.project_num where e.user_id=#{user_id} and sb.project_num=#{project_num}

select count(*) as doneBoardNum from emp e join project p on e.deptno = p.deptno join schedule_board sb on p.project_num=sb.project_num where sb.sched_prog=2 and e.user_id=#{user_id} and sb.project_num=#{project_num}
